content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: magenta_terracotta
inventory=[{"type": "pumpkin_seeds", "quantity": 24, "index": 16}, {"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 60, "index": 23}, {"type": "magenta_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 26}, {"type": "polished_andesite_slab", "quantity": 12, "index": 29}, {"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 8, "index": 34}, {"type": "chain", "quantity": 62, "index": 35}]
thought: To craft magenta_terracotta, I need to place 8 terracotta blocks in a cross pattern with magenta dye in the middle. I will start by moving 1 terracotta block from slot 34 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 34 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 34 to slot 2 with quantity 1
